com.qtplaf.library.swing.action

Class ActionSearchAndRefresh

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractAction
      • com.qtplaf.library.swing.action.ActionSearchAndRefresh
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionSearchAndRefreshDB

    public abstract class ActionSearchAndRefresh
extends javax.swing.AbstractAction
    Action aimed to search values to refresh edit fields, normally executed as a value action.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
